Topic.Title: EBAY RAISING FEES AGAIN UNDER GUISE OF LOWERING THEM

Message.Msg: Lie from an ebay employee! Ebay is the single worst place to do business with that I have ever seen. They treat sellers like they are dirt. Their employees are minimum wage monkeys that have less common sense than walmart help does. It is every sellers hope, that Ebay gets taken down by another site. After 12 years as a seller I have seen it all, and it is Ebay who is its own worst enemy. When the mass exodus happens it will be like banks in Greece, Egypt, and Cypress. It will happen quickly, and despite being able to move stuff we all hate Ebay./ paypal ( which steal $ from you, they even make money on shipping charges)) No one I know will ever have anything to do with them again. Meg Whitman losing the Ca gov race is proof positive that everyone hates Ebay, she lost for that reason alone. The new guy even worse!!!! They simply have the attitude that they are supreme, and they are right , despite making mistake after mistake on both sides of the fence. I would not own Ebay stock for a cool 1M gift, and mind you I bought it when it went public and made $400K over the first year. Owners beware. Its coming...........
Awesome stuff !!

Message.Title: Happy Easter Day From Always Beautiful Philadelphia
Message.Msg: Whew, finally wore out after a very busy morning of the extended family on a major Easter egg hunt. As you may know, kids wake at the crack of dawn, then are full of fun and energy all morning, and finally the adults can relax after brunch. Today I had all my children, my grand children, and even a great grand child visiting and that is what life is all about. All that matters in life is family and their closeness, love and respect for each other. I feel truly sorry for people who have abandoned their family for a bag of very unlucky board troll beans. I hope that helps. Here is a toast to successful happy families on this wonderful and hollowed day!

Topic.Title: EBAY RAISING FEES AGAIN UNDER GUISE OF LOWERING THEM

Message.Msg: While your final value fee may increase slightly, your up front costs for your listings will decrease. That is why most sellers will be seeing an overall decrease in fees. Contact our Customer Support Team, and we can run your actual business results in a model that takes into account the store subscriptions, final value fees, and the insertion costs and show you how your actual sales would have played out in the new fee structure. Our models take real-world numbers, not projections. We take exactly what your business did and apply it to the policies we're announcing. No estimates, no adjustments, no regional factors - simply your actual listings and sales applied to the new policies. Then you will see that your overall fees will decrease. Comparing the final value fee for one item may be your way to make a point, but you are being misleading.

Message.Title: Easter Happy, Well Ok
Message.Msg: Today I carefully sorted all well counted beans in my drawer then colored them in San Rafael hippie style patterns, but Aunt Sully turned them all brown again. Then we carefully hid them from ourselves, gathering them throughout the afternoon while meticulously cataloging each and every one, then re-filed the lot under "L" for Legume, to all be well counted and sorted, sorted and counted, again and again throughout the year.
